title: Heaven and Earth are Worthless - Novel Updates
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Arms Dealers   Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Drugs   Gangs   Merchants   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Short Story   Strong Love Interests
author: Qīng Qiū Qiān Yè   青丘千夜
description:
He found me.

He kissed me.

He taught me how to drive. The gun, taught me to kill people, taught me to survive in this sinful city. 

The only thing he didn’t teach me was how to love him. >
